snippet.title: Mech Armada - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Mech Armada is a fresh combination of turn-based tactics, deckbuilding and rogue-likes.

You are in command of a team of custom-built Mechs. Push your strategic skills to the limit as you save what's left of the Earth from the Swarm. Leverage the terrain, your Mech's unique skills and your wits to survive a series of ever-changing strategic battles and give humanity hope.

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1389360?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=gameplaytrailer

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/Augwccppsy

Website: https://mecharmada.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MechArmada
Facebook: https://facebook.com/MechArmadaGame

Copyright Lioncode Games Inc., 2021
